lenders.name: Susan

lenders.loan_because: Lots of reasons.  It makes me feel good to help others.  An amount I can afford to risk might mean a lot to someone else. By establishing a charitable person to person connection this way, I can help make the world a smaller, more personal place.
lenders.occupational_info: I determine how much traffic a development project will create and how to reduce the impacts to existing traffic.  Design tasks include traffic signs, stripes, and traffic control for special events and temporary construction/maintenance projects.  After the street system is built, I determine things like speed limits, parking restrictions, traffic signal timing, and sight distance.

I want to set an example for my kids about a key tennent in our Jewish faith: Tikkun Olam (roughly translated as "repairing or perfecting the world"). 

I want them to understand the depth of the blessings in their lives and to understand the responsibility they have to share those blessings with others.

I want them to grow up knowing that even the small ways in which they choose to help others can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info:
I spend my days mostly doing dishes and laundry and driving kids from one activity to the next... and I look forward to those rare but precious moments when I can talk to them about things that really matter.

In my free time, I love to sew and write and spend quality time with friends.

lenders.loan_because: I believe in reciprocity and that it is my responsibility to share some of what I am lucky enough to have.  I generally like to loan to fellow merchants/retailers. Something of kindred spirits.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell things that no one needs but are fun to have.  I love retail and the art of merchandising.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I believe that directly investing in small enterprises can help improve the standard of living for individuals and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the U.S. federal government to invest in and develop people who work in government agencies. I also run the DC Chapter of Net Impact's Service Corps program, which matches volunteer consultants with nonprofits on consulting engagements.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that sustainable small businesses will make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a university library that provides social science data to researchers and politicians so they can help solve social problems.

lenders.name: Eduardo L
lenders.loan_because: Little by little the world can become a better place.

lenders.name: jeff
lenders.loan_because: I feel these small loans can and do make a big difference in the lives of others. And not only the borrower but the lenders as well. And frankly I think its fun.
lenders.occupational_info:
I analyze spatial relationships between objects on the earth and make maps.
Hobbies swiming, biking, music.

lenders.name: Em & M
lenders.loan_because: Without access to credit, people are unable to take economic risks. Kiva has the ability to change the livelihoods of individuals and in doing so, can change the future of nations.

lenders.name: Justin Hess
lenders.loan_because: I care about progressing the world beyond our differences.
lenders.occupational_info: I run reports and lead a very privileged life that at times I've taken for granted. I believe that people are inherently good at heart regardless of the turmoil they experienced in the past. I believe in a new start, and giving a person a chance to succeed.

lenders.name: Mazenod 9B
lenders.loan_because: We can and the lendees need help
lenders.occupational_info: We come to school and study. We are studying Asia at the moment and we wanted to help

lenders.name: Shaun
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I want to make a difference in the world. I love the simplicity and reach of microfinance.
lenders.occupational_info: educator and humanitarian

lenders.name: Filip
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Ernest
lenders.loan_because: this is a great project

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: it makes perfect sense!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: The current aid ideology is not working, and microfinance is part of the solution to solving the global poverty issue.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an International Politics student.

lenders.name: Sachin
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

lenders.name: Nanette
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a small thing that can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people solve their problems so that they can become their best self.

lenders.name: Wim
lenders.loan_because: there is abundance and we all have a right to health, wealth and happiness; sharing resources multiplies them.
lenders.occupational_info: raising awareness about the original beneficial design of this world. Practically: protecting people from the impact of electrical devices.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: R. Patterson
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the power of generosity and micro-financing can overcome poverty.

lenders.name: Kaia
lenders.loan_because: Micro-lending is a great way to help people who would have trouble getting finance from traditional sources and I think that starting a successful business and repaying the loan must be very empowering
lenders.occupational_info: I deliver mail using a small motorbike in the beautiful northern beaches of Sydney and leafy suburbs surrounding. I like working outdoors.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I believe completely in enabling other people to build up their own businesses, and I think that this is a great way to do it. I have donated to various charities over the years but what I really like about this one is that you can actually see the company and the people that you are lending to. I also really enjoy the updates that you tend to get from the people that you invest in, it's nice to not just give money but be a little more involved with where your money is going!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a General Manager for a mid sized firm, so I manage the day to day running of the business and work with a large team of people. Although I do enjoy my work, I would rather it be the weekend where I tend to spend a lot of my time volunteering with my wife at a drop in centre. Work obviously has a place as it is the way to make a living, but I think that a person should really be judged by what they are not paid to do, which is a big reason of why I like this site!

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I love to share

lenders.name: NCFE Finance,Admin&HR
lenders.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lenders.name: Jeremias
lenders.loan_because: I am an aspiring philanthrope.

lenders.name: Greta
lenders.loan_because: I was given this as a present and it's so much fun seeing the many times it can be reused and re-lent

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: its better that my money is being used to help ordinary people than sitting in a low interest account helping giant banks.
lenders.occupational_info: I make videos for large corporations like hardware chains, stationary stores and supermarkets.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It is a very good way of helping help themselves. It is not charity.

lenders.name: RICHMOND

lenders.name: Lisa

lenders.name: Bryce

lenders.occupational_info: Investing in young people for a better tomorrow…as it was in the Beginning!

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because:
I love to see people trying to better their lives or the lives of their family. 
As of today, over the last two years, my initial $25 loan has been paid back and re-loaned 8 times so I've had a little part in helping 8 families up in the world.  I try to pick loans which are personal to me, my family or the places I've visited.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to own my own Business and i want to help others achieve there dreams.

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: I would like to make one little difference in somebody else's life.

lenders.name: The Mini Panks
lenders.loan_because: it was a Christmas Present and we want to help the people we met in Peru
lenders.occupational_info: caring conscientious daughters

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I'm happy to play even a small role in somebody improving their life and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a company that helps empower small businesses around the world.

lenders.name: Bob D.
lenders.loan_because: This is an incredible way to directly help individuals and families around the globe.

lenders.name: Audra
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams. Money shouldn't be an obstacle to that.
lenders.occupational_info: Studying to be an Ayurvedic practitioner and mental health counselor.

lenders.name: paul
lenders.loan_because: I am a big believer in small business. This is a way to help small business around the world
lenders.occupational_info: I own a small used bookstore as well as sell on the internet

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because:
it makes me feel a little better - and in some way I think this is a great idea.

This in some ways cost me nothing and I would like to see someone else get some good from something.

If everyone I knew was doing this it would make a huge difference in the world - a bit like that pass it on stuff - life is good to me so why not.

I want to see how it works out before putting more in.
lenders.occupational_info:
I help other businesses to make more money from what they have already.

I help with marketing for companies in Ireland and the UK.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I'm evil, but this throws people off the trail.
